## Data

```{r}
#| echo: false
library(DT)

# Load HHI market concentration data
hhi_url <- "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/jhelvy/vehicletrends@main/data/hhi_make.csv"
hhi_data <- read.csv(hhi_url)

# Display data table
datatable(
  hhi_data,
  options = list(
    pageLength = 10,
    scrollX = TRUE,
    dom = 'Bfrtip',
    buttons = c('copy', 'csv', 'excel')
  ),
  caption = "Market Concentration (HHI) by Brand"
)
```
